div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 846 Sokolica (formerly Dogandzi), SW of (334) Gabrovo, Bulgaria, 1912 Burial: c. 300 B.C. (T) Contents: 17 AE Seuthes III (1 over Cassander, 2 over Lysimachus) Disposition: Sofia Mouchmov, NZ 1918, pp. 52-4, illus.; BIAB 2 (1923-4), pp. 174-7, illus. (corrects earlier article on sequence of striking)
